name: The Ascent (itch)
description:
The Ascent (UCSC CMPM/ARTG120 FINAL PROJECT)

The Ascent takes you on a journey through a mysterious forest on your way to saving your trusty cat companion. 

Swing, Kick, & Jump to overcome all of the obstacles that sit in your way!

Made by: Elijah Rossman, Kristopher Yu, & Kevin Lewis
